title: DDFP 266: All-AFC East, Chris Long & Drew Pearson
itunes:title: DDFP 266: All-AFC East, Chris Long & Drew Pearson
description:
Birthday boy Shek welcomes in Handsome Hank and NFL ATL's Gregg Rosenthal to draft the All-AFC East team. Then, St. Louis Rams defensive Chris Long calls in to discuss the "First-Round Foursome", Michael Sam and his thoughts on the World Cup. Lastly, Shek and Elliot Harrison delve into NFL history alongside former Dallas Cowboys wide receiver Drew Pearson. It's a birthday episode extravaganza. Take a listen, won't you?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
